string.name: water_info_1
string.font:
Your body consists of about 60% water. You hydrate the most from water-dense foods like fruits and vegetables when you eat. 

So you are easy to be dehydrated during fasting. Because there may be a full day between meals, it's critical to drink water in the fasting period.

string.name: water_info_2

font.b: How to know if I drink enough water?

string.font:
The easiest way to estimate how well hydrated you are is to look at your urine. 

It should be fairly clear. If it's dark yellow, that's a sign you may need to drink more water.

string.name: fasting_info
string.font:
• Drink water or herbal tea to stay hydrated. 

• Keep your mind off food.

• Avoid high-intensity workouts.
